title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Problem-Based Learning (PBL) for Radiological Image Interpretation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational radiology theory and understanding of medical imaging equipment
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain radiation image quality assessment criteria at 80% or higher accuracy through PBL activities
Learners achieve 90% participation while solving image interpretation problems based on real clinical cases through group collaboration
Learners demonstrate a 20% or greater improvement in image interpretation ability scores in pre-post assessments after the PBL process
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
